results.title: Bathroom Get Naked Wall Decal Sticker
results.description:
Get Naked Wall Decal


Visit Our Shop: http://stickywallvinyl.etsy.com

**********************************************
DECAL SIZES:
**********************************************

17 inches wide by 10 inches high
27 inches wide by 16 inches high
37 inches wide by 22 inches high

wide= left to right
high = top to bottom

* Measurements may vary slightly

I can customize this decal in any size you wish.  
Please contact me and I will be happy to help you! :)

**********************************************
WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE IN YOUR PACKAGE:
**********************************************

- Your chosen vinyl decal
- Test decal to get some practice
- Easy to follow, step by step instructions on how to apply your wall decal

**********************************************
TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS FOR OUR WALL DECALS:
**********************************************

•Proudly hand-crafted in the USA

•100% Easily Removable with no adhesive residue and no damage to your walls

•Extremely easy peel and stick application

•Made of the best available matte vinyl that is made specifically for wall decals

•Looks hand painted when applied

•Wall Decals are cut precisely with only the design that you see, no background. The surface that you apply it to will be your background

•Decals are removable but not re-usable once removed

•Decals can be applied to walls, laptops, game systems, fans, doors, windows, mirrors, appliances and much more

•Decals are recommended for smooth or lightly textured walls for best results

**********************************************
TYPICAL BED SIZES:
**********************************************

If you would like to apply your decal above your bed, here are the standard bed sizes to help you decide on the perfect size wall decal:
 
Twin Bed - 39 inches wide
Full Bed - 54 inches wide
Queen Bed - 60 inches wide
King Bed - 76 inches wide
California King Bed - 72 inches wide

**********************************************

Visit Our Shop: http://stickywallvinyl.etsy.com

results.title: Wall art  vinyl Together we make a family home decal home decor sticker letters

results.title: Painted Pallet Wood Sign 28 1/8" X 19 1/2"
results.description: This piece measures approximately 28 1/8” X 19 1/2”, the planks range from 2” wide to 3 7/8” wide and are 5/8” thick. This is made from reclaimed pallet wood and the type of wood varies. This is painted with spray paint and is lightly sanded. I can seal it if you need it sealed. I sanded these after they were glued together and put quite a bit of pressure without the slats budging. The back slats are nailed and glued so it is nice and sturdy. When I ship these, I shrink wrap, protect the corners, and layer with cardboard.

results.title: Live Love Laugh Unisex T Shirt - Shirt with sayings - Graphics Tee
results.description:
Live Love Laugh Unisex T-Shirt

The shirts are Unisex Bella Canvas Brand. The shirts are super soft, lightweight, and comfy.



DETAILS

Shirts are: 
-52% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton/48% polyester 
-Side-seamed
-Retail Fit
-High-quality soft fabric 
-Unisex is a looser fit, very similar to men’s sizing.

Design 
 -Made out of heat pressed vinyl cut out.  

CARE 
-Machine wash warm 
-Wash inside out with like colors. 
-Tumble dry low heat or hang to dry. 
-Do not iron directly over the design.
-No bleach/fabric softener.

NOTES
-Allow 1-3 business days for production.
-Allow 3-5 business days for shipping.
-Any jeans, shoes, and accessories pictured are NOT included.

Follow us on Instagram @CoutureStylezMia for updates and more!

results.title: You Are My Happy Antiqued Distressed Prim Sign Show your appreciation to the person who makes you happy on Valentine's Day
results.description:
"You are my happy" This rustic style sign is a perfect gift for that special someone that always makes you happy. We've included a small star as a period that gives it yet another unique touch. 

This sign measures approximately 5.5 x 12 inches and is on 3/4 inch thick wood. This creation is shown in FrenchGray/Antique White, Black/Antique White, and DarkBlue/Antique White. 

• Shipment is generally 3 to 5 business days.

• Hanger attached on backside for easy hanging

• Several other color options available in drop down selection. The first color will be the color of the text & second color will be the background.

• Hand painted laser engraved creation is made to order.

• If we are shipping directly as gift, we can enclose a small handwritten note card, be sure to let us know what you want the card to say in the note section.

• PROCESS Our handcrafted creations are made using a 7 step process to create a beautiful expression to be cherished for years to come. Two contrasting colors of paint are applied, the design is laser engraved, a fine hairline is applied to the design which gives an awesome touch. The final touches are completed once it goes through our antiquing process with edges distressed.

• COLOR We have a variety of color choices, but if you don't see what you are looking for, please ask  & we will see if we can make it happen for you. Keep in mind when selecting the color options, the first color is the text color, while the second color is the background. See policies for additional questions/clarification on colors.

• Please note these signs are not massed produced but each is unique and no two are exactly the same.

• When working with wood and the antiquing process, each sign has its own warmth and charm. While we try to get the best wood at the lumber yard, sometimes there will be knots or other slight imperfections in the wood, this is considered adding character to the rustic style of this line of our signs. Thanks for stopping by our shop and please do not hesitate to ask any questions.

Be sure to check out our other signs. https://www.etsy.com/shop/ExpressionsNmore?ref=hdr_shop_menu

Color Samples can be seen in a variety of sizes at  https://www.expressionsnmore.com/color-examples-rustic-laser-engraved/

results.title: Live, Laugh, Love Picture
results.description:
Beautiful handmade pebble art “Live, Laugh, Love” picture that will fill anyone with inspiration and happiness. 

This picture could be personalised with individuals’ names, maybe family members or a group of friends to create a picture that is unique to everybody. You could also add additional bird characters to the scene. 

If you have any questions or want to alter the design slightly to suit your style or specific requirements please don’t hesitate to contact me.

The pebbles and driftwood I use to create my pictures all come from along the Lincolnshire coastline or from the eastern beaches of Spain. Please be aware that each pebble art picture I create will be unique and special; the pebbles I collect vary in colour and shape, but each picture will be as lovely as the one shown in the images. 

The framed pebble picture is set into a box frame 23.5 X 23.5cm (depth 3cm) with the option of four finishes, white, black, oak effect or grey.
Back ground card is high quality arts and craft card and can be changed to grey, white or pale blue

Ready to ship 5-7 days
From United Kingdom

results.title: Live...Laugh...Love - Wish Bracelet - 5 Options
results.description:
Live...Laugh...Love - Wish Bracelet

You will receive 1 bracelet. 

Wish Bracelets make special little gifts to give.  Perfect to pop inside a greeting card, to accompany a present or to be given as party favors.

As the tale goes, Close your eyes and make a wish, then tie the bracelet to your wrist. When the bracelet breaks in two the wish you made may soon come true.

Handmade

Hemp Cord

Colors of beads, cord and colored card stock may vary from picture unless specified in a note to seller

Silver Live Laugh Love Charm

Printed on Card Stock

results.title: Live Love Laugh, Live Love Laugh Car Decal, Quote Decal, Girly Car Decals, Girly Stickers
results.description:
LIVE, LAUGH, LOVE car decal. Simple decal to place on your car.

All decals are made using high quality Oracal 651 vinyl. Oracal 651 vinyl has a durability rating of up to six (6) years. This vinyl is permanent, it can be removed from your vehicle but is not reusable.

This decal comes in 3 size choices and over 20 color choices.

SIZES:
5 x 5 inches
6 x 6 inches
7 x 7 inches
8 x 8 inches

All decals include application instructions.

SHIPPING INFO
- Order will be ready for shipping 3-5 days after payment is processed. Weekend and holidays are NOT business days.
- You may upgrade your shipping to Priority mail for an extra fee (this will not speed up the time it takes for me to create your decal)
*THERE IS A DISCOUNT ON SHIPPING FOR MULTIPLE ORDERS*

If you have any questions or special request please do not hesitate to message me

results.title: Live Laugh Love Printable 8x10 Wall Hanging
results.description:
Live Laugh Love 8x10 Printable Art Wall Hanging

These make a wonderful addition to your home decor or office wall art, or as gifts for your family and friends.

results.title: Printable Vintage French Style Fleur De Lis Live Love Laugh Poster Print PDF File
results.description:
•♥• DIGITAL FILE. YOU PRINT. •♥•
•♥• INSTANT DOWNLOAD. NOT PERSONALIZED. •♥•

You can find detailed instructions on how to access your instant download below.

If you like to DIY then you've found your girl to help you build a perfectly coordinated set of printable party supplies! 

It is my specialty to create printable items to match any theme. If this design doesn't suit your style "convo" me to get started on your custom order today!

Check out my coordinating Vintage French Welcome Friends Poster here: https://www.etsy.com/listing/538605035

Decorate your paris theme party with this vintage French style poster that can be framed and used for several different occasions or as art to decorate your home!

What you get:
• 1 PDF File in the design as pictured
• PDF File size is 16" x 20" but can be scaled down for a smaller size print.

Take the file to your favorite print shop and print as many as you need!

If you need a different size, different wording, or different colors, just "convo" me for a custom print made just for you!

All of my designs are made at 300 dpi for high quality prints.

INSTANT DOWNLOAD INSTRUCTIONS:
• 5-10 minutes after purchasing a digital file, you’ll see a View your files link which goes to the Downloads page where you can download all the files associated with your order.
• Downloads are available once your payment is confirmed. If you paid with PayPal or a credit card on Etsy, confirmation might take a few minutes.
• You will also receive a download notification email separate from any transaction notification emails you receive from Etsy and/or PayPal.
• Please note that you can't download a digital purchase through the Etsy app at this time. To download a digital file, please sign in to Etsy on your mobile browser or a non-mobile computer.
• Once you have downloaded the file(s) you can print at home or at a print shop of your choice. 
• Print as many copies as you wish. Not for resale. For personal, non-commercial use only. 
• For additional help accessing your Instant Download(s) please see this Etsy Help Page https://www.etsy.com/help/article/3949 where you can find answers to most of your questions.

DIGITAL AND PRINTABLE ITEMS TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
- Due to the digital nature of the items sold in my shop, all digital sales are final. No refunds. Colors will vary depending on the device you are using. Also, the final print quality will differ based on the type of paper and printers that are used. For this reason, I do not issue refunds for color issues.
- Not for resale. For personal, non-commercial use only. 

If you have any questions at all please feel free to send me a message.
